    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030606</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030606</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los océanos</string>
            <string language="en">The oceans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ozeane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les océans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os oceanos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli oceani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ωκεανοί</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Los océanos contienen la mayor cantidad de agua. Se explica que en ellos se producen las corrientes marinas, las olas y las mareas. Cada movimiento tiene asociada una página explicativa.</string>
            <string language="en">Most of the planet's water is contained in the oceans. There is an explanation of how this is where sea currents, waves and tides are produced. Each movement has an associated explanatory page.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">océanos</string>
            <string language="en">oceans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die meisten des Wassers des Planeten wird in den 
Ozeanen enthalten. Es gibt eine Erklärung von, wie dieses ist, 
wo Seeströme, -wellen und -Gezeiten produziert werden. 
Jede Bewegung hat eine verbundene erläuternde Seite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La majeure partie de l'eau de la planète est 
contenue dans les océans. Il y a une explication de la façon 
dont c'est où des courants, les vagues et les marées de mer sont 
produits. Chaque mouvement a une page explicative associée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A maioria da água do planeta é contida nos 
oceanos. Há uma explanação de como este é o lugar onde as 
correntes, as ondas e as marés do mar são produzidas. Cada 
movimento tem uma página explanatória associada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La maggior parte dell'acqua del pianeta è 
contenuta negli oceani. Ci è una spiegazione di come questo è 
dove le correnti, le onde e le maree del mare sono prodotte. 
Ogni movimento ha una pagina esplicativa collegata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μεγαλύτερο μέρος του ύδατος του πλανήτη 
περιλαμβάνεται στους ωκεανούς. Υπάρχει μια εξήγηση για το 
πώς αυτό είναι όπου τα θαλάσσια ρεύματα, τα κύματα και οι 
παλίρροιες παράγονται. Κάθε μετακίνηση έχει μια σχετική 
επεξηγηματική σελίδα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ozeane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">océans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
